thread.title: It's migrate or die for many Venezuelans

title: It's migrate or die for many Venezuelans
text:
It's migrate or die for many Venezuelans 1:12pm GMT - 02:12 
More than half a million Venezuelans have flooded into Colombia, many illegally, hoping to escape the grinding poverty and shortages of food and medicine that sank their country into crisis. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
More than half a million Venezuelans have flooded into Colombia, many illegally, hoping to escape the grinding poverty and shortages of food and medicine that sank their country into crisis.
